title: Wild wings [B&W]
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey, Patrick Carey and John Taylor
brief_description: With many fascinating shots of rare species of wild fowl, this film documents the twins duties - observation and protection - of the Wildfowl Trust in Gloucestershire.
